source.a069510f:
y_true = [
    'amecro',
    'amecro amerob',
    'nocall',
]
y_pred = [
    'amecro',
    'amecro amerob',
    'nocall',
]
row_wise_micro_averaged_f1_score(y_true, y_pred)
source.0b148bcb:
y_true = [
    'amecro',
    'amecro amerob',
    'nocall',
]
y_pred = [
    'amecro',
    'amecro bird666',
    'nocall',
]
row_wise_micro_averaged_f1_score(y_true, y_pred)
source.7fefcc82:
y_true = [
    'bird1 bird2 bird3 bird4',
    'bird1 bird2 bird3 bird4',
    'bird1 bird2 bird3 bird4',
]
y_pred = [
    'bird1 bird2 bird3 bird4',
    'bird6 bird7',
    'bird2 bird3 bird6 bird7',
]
row_wise_micro_averaged_f1_score(y_true, y_pred)
